title: New Account, Skill Cast messed up
body:
Hello,

So Yesterday i made a new Account just to play ranked a bit and speciliase on a certain champ. 

On my main Acc as Xin/Soraka for example if you have to cast the charge/heal on an enemy/ally i can target them and click with my left mouse button to activate it. 

On my new Acc (even tho i copied the settings) it either way goes like holding down the skill button and its getting cast on release or that it instantly casts uppon pressing towards the cursor which requires me to concentrate alot more and predict the skill range (you can hover over the skill to see the range, but it doesnt stay)

I was wondering what is wrong with my new acc. 
If i press esc there is this new quick cast option which toggles between holding down the button and instant cast .. on soraka it was funny as the indicator was gone (like it didnt show the skill range nor did the cursor change)

As Aatrox it wasnt that bad (could execute the skills and combos faster) but on champs where you have to target an enemy/ally its really hard. 

As the only thing i did change was binding a Key for the "Attack champions only" Option .. maybe thats why



@Off Topic: 
According to Platinium 4, dodging skills is considered being a Bronze Noob. 
Stay out of your and their Attack Range, dont get exp and dont buy Sightstone/Heal and Shield Items as Support. Otherwise these new Meta Plat4's gonna report you

replies.body:
Account settings are sync'd to our servers, so your options might be different.  It sounds like you might not have quick cast enabled, but you can double check in your bindings options.  Otherwise, your issue might caused by a corrupt config failing to respond to your inputs properly:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Left clicking to perform an ability without actually it sounds really weird though.  Make sure you're not running any modifications for league that could do something like that!
